definition[0]: to make something sweeter, or become sweeter
example[0]: Sweeten the mixture with a little honey.
definition[1]: to try to persuade someone to do what you want, by giving them presents or money or promising them something
example[1]: a cash bonus to sweeten the deal
definition[2]: to make someone kinder, gentler etc
example[2]: Old age had not sweetened her.
definition[3]: to make an offer, suggestion etc seem more attractive in order to encourage someone to accept it
example[4]: The British auto maker has sweetened its customer incentives by adding credit facilities.
